about_the_game:
While being a prisoner to the Ottoman Court, waiting for the sultan's order, Vlad Dracula travels to slave markets, dungeons and prisons recruiting skilled warriors to help him take his Wallachian throne. This is when he hears about a great warrior held in the darkest dungeon under the castle of Egrigoz.

He knows this place well, he himself was held in chains here since he was 12. He spent his childhood years between these walls living in terror, screams and darkness, soaked with the stench of death. He returns now to this darkness, where he himself was forged in horrors, and his soul hardened by the flames of hell. But he's unchained now, filled with burning fire, and armed with a steel sword!

.

Experience a gorgeous Classicvania game, drawn in GameBoy style and inspired by NES classics like Castlevania I/III, Ninja Gaiden III, Shatterhand etc. Pick up your sword and fight your way through those awesome dungeons, hit the torches to get life and ammo, discover secrets hidden behind breakable walls and kneel in key places to get some awesome rewards!

But above all, see the world through the eyes of the legendary Vlad Tepes Dracula, discover the dark side of the story!

.

The action takes place before Episode 1, so you will discover some interesting connections both in terms of story and characters. It's all part of the big story. If you haven't seen Episode 1, check it out! 

A game by Tiberius

content_descriptors.notes: You play as Vlad "the Impaler" Dracula, so impaling and other forms of medieval torture will be seen in the game, in pixel art form.
